steps.title: Step 1: Add a symbol
steps.text: Click on the SYMBOL button in the toolbar to add a new Rect to the canvas

steps.title: Step 2: Change Geometry Shape
steps.text: Select the new mark and change it's shape in the property inspector to 'triangle up' which is under Geometry.

steps.title: Step 2: Change color
steps.text: Select the new mark and then change it's color to #bbCCaa in the property inspector
